Cards.name: Monkey.D.Luffy
Cards.effect: [Your Turn] When a Character is K.O.'d, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to this Leader.

Cards.name: Uta
Cards.effect: This Character cannot be K.O.'d in battle by Leaders.<br

Cards.name: Koby
Cards.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

Cards.name: Shanks
Cards.effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: K.O. all Characters with a cost of 1 or less.

Cards.name: Shirahoshi
Cards.effect: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)<br

Cards.name: Nefeltari Vivi
Cards.effect: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.)

Cards.name: Higuma
Cards.effect: [On Play] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2 cost during this turn.

Cards.name: Makino
Cards.effect: [On Play] If there is a Character with a cost of 0, draw 1 card.

Cards.name: Mr.2.Bon.Kurei(Bentham)
Cards.effect: [DON!! x1] At the end of a battle in which this Character battles your opponent's Character, you may K.O. the opponent’s Character you battled with. If you do, K.O. this Character.

Cards.name: Gum-Gum Bell
Cards.effect: [Main] You may add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand: Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −7 cost during this turn.

Cards.name: Gum-Gum Pistol
Cards.effect: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.
